document_data.name: Order of the Leaping Stag
document_data.orgname: the Order of the Leaping Stag
document_data.mainbody: The '''Order of the Leaping Stag''' was an honorary order of dancers devoted to [[Lliira]], the Goddess of Joy.
document_data.History: Each member of the Order of the Leaping Stag was recognized by the [[Church of Lliira]] for their ability to evoke the nature of an animal during a performance.
